forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.
